mil5.2.6:1.2: ‘yo ajananto panatipatam karoti, so balavataram apunnam pasavati’ti.
mil5.2.6:1.5: Yadi, bhante nagasena, ajanitva panatipatam karonto balavataram apunnam pasavati, tena hi ‘anapatti ajanantassa’ti yam vacanam, tam miccha.
mil5.2.6:1.6: Yadi anapatti ajanantassa, tena hi ‘ajanitva panatipatam karonto balavataram apunnam pasavati’ti tampi vacanam miccha.
mil5.2.6:1.7: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho duruttaro duratikkamo tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.6:2.1: “Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata ‘yo ajananto panatipatam karoti, so balavataram apunnam pasavati’ti.
mil5.2.6:2.6: Atthi, maharaja, apatti sannavimokkha, atthi apatti nosannavimokkha.
mil5.2.6:2.7: Yayam, maharaja, apatti sannavimokkha, tam apattim arabbha bhagavata bhanitam—
